title: The Superman 5-Film Collection (1978-2006)
description: All Regions release, playable on all worldwide players.

The 5-movie Superman collection in High-Definition Featuring: Superman the Movie, Superman II, Superman III, Superman IV: The Quest for Peace, and Superman Returns. Special features include: TV Specials, George Reeves In Superman And The Mole-Men, The Complete Fleischer/Famous Studios 1940s Superman Cartoons, Filmmaker Commentaries, Featurettes and much much more!
